item.title: CABIN DIFF Pressure Indicator – Pressurized Flight

numlitem.para: CABIN ALT indicator is operative, and
A chart is provided to convert cabin altitude to cabin differential pressure.
Use the following chart to convert altitude to cabin differential pressure.

placard.para: Placard near CABIN DIFF Pressure Indicator on P5 panel "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
